thread.title: Good location and helpful staff
thread.title_full: Good location and helpful staff - Review of Novotel New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: amaraber
title: Good location and helpful staff
text: We stayed here for just a night. the hotel is just a stone's throw away from the Times Square. Our room was a basic one and it had a good view of the city, including the Times Square ! the Check-in staff and concierge were warm and helpful. We enjoyed our short stay here and will recommend this property to others.
